summary: This document is a confidential email notification sent on July 30, 2019, informing that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. He appeared before the Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report and is pending a disciplinary hearing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and faced a Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report.

events.title: Epstein moved to SHU for self-mutilation incident
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. He appeared before the Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report and is pending a hearing before the Disciplinary Hearing Officer.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on July 30, 2019.
Epstein faced a Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report.
He was pending a hearing before the Disciplinary Hearing Officer at the time of the notification.
The document is marked as confidential and appears to be internal correspondence regarding Epstein's status in custody.
